title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chamonix Valley, France
content:
Photo submitted by Scott Cornish, “Sub zero temperatures have meant compacted, solid snow suitable for the 29er wheels! Winter rides in the Chamonix Valley (Image by myself using a timer and tripod.)” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chamonix Valley, France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
